_header: Hail spouse of Christ our Saviour
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, Gaude mater gloriosa — six quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘Super omnes speciosa’ and burden: ‘Gaude mater gloriosa / Super omnes speciosa’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Haile spowse of criste oure saviourhaile lilly floure of swete
                    odoure…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…To heven blis that lasteth ayeSuper omnes
                    speciosa
